user.title: Connect to Cults3D
user.description: Enter your Cults3D username and API key. You can generate an API key from your Cults3D account settings under the API page.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Cults3D
reauth_confirm.description: The API key for {username} is no longer valid. Please enter a new API key.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or API key. Please check your credentials and ensure the user exists on Cults3D.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Cults3D account is already configured.
